title: Contribution to United Nation Mine Action Service
description: The United Nations Mine Action Service (UNMAS) collaborates with 11 other UN departments, agencies, programmes and funds to ensure an effective, proactive and coordinated response to the problems of landmines and explosive remnants of war, including cluster munitions. Funding under this investment includes the provision of a grant to support UNMAS, including supporting the monitoring and evaluation mechanism and the review of the United Nations Gender Guidelines for Mine Action Programmes. The total value of this investment is $0.3 million to be expensed during the 2017-18 financial year.
